scripts.start: yarn run b:random && yarn run b:today && yarn run b:byid
scripts.b:random: autocannon --title "GET /v1/ - Random Jokes" --method GET --amount 100 --bailout 3 --headers user-agent=benchmark https://jokesbapak2.herokuapp.com/v1/
scripts.b:byid: autocannon --title "GET /v1/id/5 - Joke by ID" --method GET --amount 100 --bailout 3 --headers user-agent=benchmark https://jokesbapak2.herokuapp.com/v1/id/5
